adjectives.description: cornute (comparative more cornute, superlative most cornute)

verbs.description: cornute (third-person singular simple present cornutes, present participle cornuting, simple past and past participle cornuted)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To give 'horns' to; to make a cuckold of.
examples: ‘Will you cooperate with me in cornuting your husband? It's a must!’
